title: i cant create a new account
body: i cant create a new account. I cicked make a new acc tehn wrote my email username etc and at the end clicked CREATE MY ACCOUNT and nothing appears plz help me.

replies.body: Heya, this can happen if you're using an email that's already registered or the age selected is under 13.  The site can be finicky sometimes and not give an error, but those are the most common cases.  I hope that helps!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=FAWK0kEx,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-12-15T18:39:56.186+0000)
>
> Heya, this can happen if you're using an email that's already registered 

Are you new?
You can have unlimited Accounts on the same Mail Adress.

Not upon account creation.  You can change to an existing email address through the management page, but you'll need to signup with an unused addressed first.

I also understand you're not interested in receiving support, but please don't spam these boards or harass agents.

Threatend by the Support, thats new. 

And yes upon Account Creation. You must be new that you didn't know about this, i guess.
